name: 創新設計（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【VDU0253  創新設計（一）】
description: 本課程為設計課程，藉由工作坊形式(workshop)為引導學生藉由草圖、比例模型、基本造型進行設計思考發想(design thinking)、小組討論(group discussion)、動手製作(making)的實體物件與作品發表(presentation)，引導學生實驗與創新，產生新的原創觀點。
syllabus:
課程簡紹

Explore the idea of innovation design by acquiring professional knowledge of design industries to learn the design technologies and processes and apply design thinking to develop an innovative design. 

  
課程目標

1.  Acknowledge the design process and technology to develop innovation in design
2.  Enrich the basic knowledge in design from different scale and discipline
3.  Cultivate wide range of design concept for innovation design
4.  Develop the skill of solving problems in design field

  
教學進度與主題

This class seeks the idea of innovation in design in different scales from product to space by applying the design thinking method. The enrolled students start with an investigation for defining what is an innovative design by looking through different types of design. The assignment is Desing for SDGs, which studends investigate design solution for creating social issues. The investigation employs the Circula Design Guide as the guideline to aquire knowledge in circular economy and design. The first half of semester consists with a series of workshop for learning and brainstorming the circular design theory and tools, while at the second half of semester studens explore their interests in the circular design to develop design solution.   
  
  
教學進度與主題        Design for SDGs
